ygData.subject: Perfect Party?
ygData.msgSnippet: What do you think the perfect party would contain. I m interested in getting some discussion going. If you could have a party of 6 what kind of characters
ygData.messageBody:
What do you think the perfect party would
contain. I'm interested in getting some discussion going.
If you could have a party of 6 what kind of
characters would be in it. I can guess a tank Warrior, and
artillery Wiz, that's 2. What other skills would you need?
A ranger to track? A necro/bard to retrieve bodies?
A cleric/shaman to buff/heal you? Number them from
1 to 6 and hell, we may even start forming 6 man
groups to take on the challenges of
Norrath!!<br><br>Jonquil
